title: Did Tyga just take a shady dig at Kylie Jenner on Instagram?
text:
From Cosmopolitan

Off the back of Kylie Jenner making it very clear she wasn't reuniting with ex-boyfriend Tyga, the rapper seemingly just made a subtle dig at her on Instagram.

The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star recently broke up with Travis Scott, who she shares a 20-month-old daughter, Stormi Webster, with.

It's been a busy few weeks for Kylie Jenner. Following her break up from Travis Scott, the Keeping Up With The Kardashians star was forced to deny she had met up with ex-boyfriend Tyga.

She and Travis were then been spotted co-parenting their daughter Stormi, leading to reconciliation rumours, all around the same time as a clip of her singing "Riiiiise and Shine" was turned into a viral meme. Yeah, it's been a lot.

And while Kylie has clearly seen the funny side of the song, fans were left wondering whether Tyga was being shady towards his ex-girlfriend with his latest Instagram caption. "Rise n shine," he wrote to his 17million followers with a picture of his tiger print sports car.

"THE CAPTION THOUGH! 😂😂😭😭" one person commented, while another added, "You and Kylie are up to something 'cause this getting too real now 😂." A third said, "Tyga you did NOT," while a fourth said, "Rise and shine? 😂 Is he trying to get Kylie’s attention?"

It's unclear what Tyga's up to. Is he being shady? Are he and Kylie on good terms? Has he been listening to the 'Rise And Shine' remix too? Who even knows.

The “rise and shine” video came about when Kylie was giving her camera crew a tour of her Kylie Cosmetics office and went to show them Stormi’s room. As Kylie flipped the lights on, she sang “rise and shine” to an already-awake Stormi and a cameraperson who was filming from the corner. It was truly brilliant.
